DOC.brief_summary: Samples of blood and urine will be analyzed for biomarkers to check their predictivity of Graft-versus-Host Disease (GVHD) outcomes.
DOC.brief_title: Analysis of Biomarkers for Acute Graft-versus-Host Disease (GVHD)
DOC.detailed_description: To determine if serum biomarkers of inflammation correlate with onset and severity of acute GVHD, particularly GVHD of the gut.
DOC.criteria: 18 years old or older patients Undergoing allogeneic stem cell transplant
